fixes.name: Deal
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level IF that checks if 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TRADE_ID] equals the literal "N/A"; returns 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[SECURITY_ID] when true, otherwise returns 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TRADE_ID]. No aggregations or parameters, so implemented as a calculated column.
